price: 47.Sinaamey siinik duma warrayya itte ummatta inkih farmoytay ken tirtóh rubsume Ie, tokkel ken farmoyti Qhiyaamah ayro yamaate waqdi, Yalli ken fan qadaalatal mekla usun aben taamah galtól andullume kalah.
arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ رَّسُولٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ رَسُولُهُمۡ قُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walikulli ummatin rasūlun fa-idhā jāa rasūluhum quḍiya baynahum bil-qis'ṭi wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
